meanings.sent1: The soap frothed when I scrubbed my hands vigorously.
meanings.sent2: The milk frothed beautifully as I prepared a latte.
meanings.sent3: The fountain frothed with excitement, spraying water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Emotions frothed within her, ready to overflow.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds frothed ominously, signaling a downpour.

meanings.sent1: The frothed milk added a creamy touch to the coffee.
meanings.sent2: The frothed waves crashed against the shore in a mesmerizing rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The frothed cake looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her frothed hair sparkled in the sunlight like spun gold.
meanings.sent5: The frothed clouds painted a dreamy picture in the sky.
